# File lsgmake-gap.rb, line 380
  def submit
    @job_name = @run_name + '.' + @target_pattern.gsub(/%I/, 'N')
    bmake = BsubMake.new(@job_name, @target_pattern)
    bmake.job_array(@@lanes)
    bmake.dependency(@dependency) if @dependency
    if !bmake.submit
      return false
    end
    @job_name = bmake.job_name
  end
